recipe: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add cumin, curry powder, cloves, cinnamon, and turmeric; cook for 1 minute. Add 1 cup water and simmer for 5 minutes. Add tomatoes, cauliflower, bell peppers, potatoes, zucchini, serrano pepper, and ginger; cook, stirring often, 5 minutes. Add 2 cups water and vinegar, cover, and simmer 10 minutes more.
